$description: Talent pool for TattooNOW Show. Central list of people the team can invite to fill show tape slots. Agent cross-references this when sourcing tapes for upcoming shows. Organized by role type and tagged by expertise for theme/season matching.

roles.interview: Live on-camera guest. Comfortable with conversation. Portfolio-forward.
roles.text-qa: Async written Q&A. For camera-shy, remote, or schedule-constrained talent.
roles.panelist: Multi-guest discussion participant. Opinionated, engaging, plays well with others.
roles.variety: Game/segment participant. Fun energy, good sport.

statuses.available: Not yet contacted, ready to reach out
statuses.confirmed: Confirmed for a specific show or generally interested
statuses.declined: Said no (for now). Can re-approach later.
statuses.appeared: Has been on the show. Track which episodes.
statuses.recurring: Standing invite — can appear multiple times per season

agentNotes.sourcing: When filling tape slots, cross-reference talent pool tags with show theme and season tags. Prioritize talent who haven't appeared recently. For panel tapes, select talent with contrasting perspectives.
agentNotes.reachOut: Agent can draft DM/email templates. Human confirms before sending.
agentNotes.tracking: Update status after each contact. Log all appearances. After a show, mark as 'appeared' and add episode reference.
